CreateInstance.summary: You can call this operation to create an OceanBase cluster.

schema.title: 实例的付费方式。取值范围：  PrePay：包年包月。选择该类付费方式时，您必须确认自己的账号支持余额支付/信用支付，否则将返回 InvalidPayMethod的错误提示。 PostPay（默认）：按量付费。其默认按小时来计费
schema.description:
The billing method of the instance. Valid values:  
- PrePay: the subscription billing method. You must ensure that the remaining balance or credit balance of your account can cover the cost of the subscription. Otherwise, you will receive an InvalidPayMethod error. 
- PostPay: the pay-as-you-go billing method. This is the default value. By default, fees are charged on an hourly basis.

schema.title: 实例的系列  - normal（默认）：标准集群版（云盘）  - normal_ssd：标准集群版（本地盘） - history：历史库集群版, normal_kv: obkv集群, normal_hg: 信创集群(需要添加白名单开放)。
schema.description:
The series of the OceanBase cluster. Valid values:    
- normal: Standard Cluster Edition (Cloud Disk). This is the default value.
- normal_ssd: Standard Cluster Edition (Local Disk).
- history: History Database Cluster Edition.

schema.title: 实例所属的可用区ID。更多详情，请参见DescribeZones获取可用区列表。
schema.description:
The ID of the zone to which the instance belongs.   
For more information about how to obtain the list of zones, see [DescribeZones](~~25610~~).

schema.title:
集群规格信息。
当前支持以下套餐：
- 4C16GB：4核 16GB
- 8C32GB：8核 32GB
- 14C70GB：14核 70GB
- 24C120GB：24核 120GB
- 30C180GB：30核 180GB
- 62C400GB：62核 400GB
- 104C600GB：104核 600GB
- 16C70GB：16核 70GB
- 32C160GB：32核 160GB
- 64C380GB：64核 380GB
- 20C32GB：20核 32GB
- 40C64GB：40核 64GB
- 16C32GB：16核 32GB
- 32C70GB：32核 70GB
- 64C180GB：64核 180GB
- 32C180GB：32核 180GB
- 64C400GB：64核 400GB。
schema.description:
The specifications of the cluster.     
You can specify one of the following four plans:   
 - 8C32GB: indicates 8 CPU cores and 32 GB of memory.    
 - 14C70GB: indicates 14 CPU cores and 70 GB of memory. This is the default value.
- 30C180GB: indicates 30 CPU cores and 180 GB of memory.     
- 62C400GB: indicates 62 CPU cores and 400 GB of memory.

schema.title: 存储空间大小，单位GB。  存储空间的限制根据集群规格不同而不同，具体如下：  - 8C32GB：100GB~10000GB  - 14C70GB：200GB~10000GB  - 30C180GB：400GB~10000GB  - 62C400G：800GB-10000GB。  各套餐的存储空间默认值为其最小值。
schema.description:
The size of the storage space,in GB.    
The limits on the storage space vary with the cluster specifications:   
- 8C32GB: 100 GB to 10000 GB   
- 14C70GB: 200 GB to 10000 GB   
- 30C180GB: 400 GB to 10000 GB   
- 62C400GB: 800 GB to 10000 GB    
The preceding minimum storage space sizes are the default storage space sizes of the corresponding cluster specification plans.

schema.title: 购买资源的时长，单位由PeriodUnit指定。当参数InstanceChargeType取值为PrePaid时才生效且为必选值。 取值范围：   PeriodUnit=Month时，Period取值：{“1”, “2”, “3”, “4”, “5”, “6”, “7”, “8”, “9”}。 PeriodUnit=Year时，Period取值：{“1”, “2”, “3”}。
schema.description:
The valid duration of the purchased resources. The unit is specified by the PeriodUnit parameter.   
This parameter is valid and required only when the InstanceChargeType parameter is set to PrePaid.      
Valid values:     
- When the PeriodUnit parameter is set to Month: "1", "2", "3", "4", "5", "6", "7", "8", "9". 
- When the PeriodUnit parameter is set to Year: "1", "2", "3".

schema.title:
购买资源的时长。
包年包月取值范围：Month 或者 Year。
默认值：包年包月为 Month，按量计费，默认周期为 Hour。
schema.description:
The unit of the valid duration of the purchased resources.     
Valid value for subscription: Month or Year.
Default value: Month for subscription, and Hour for pay-as-you-go.

schema.title: 是否要自动续费。当参数ChargeType取值PrePaid时生效。取值范围：  true：自动续费。 false（默认）：不自动续费。
schema.description:
Specifies whether to enable automatic renewal.   
This parameter is valid only when the ChargeType parameter is set to PrePaid. Valid values: 
- true: enables automatic renewal for the instance.   
- false: disables automatic renewal for the instance. This is the default value.

schema.title:
每次自动续费的时长，当参数 AutoRenew 取值 True 时，该参数为必填参数。
PeriodUnit 为 Year 时，AutoRenewPeriod 取值范围为 {"1", "2", "3"}。
PeriodUnit 为 Month 时，AutoRenewPeriod 取值范围为 {"1", "2", "3", "6", "12"}。
schema.description:
The automatic renewal period of the instance. This parameter is required when the AutoRenew parameter is set to true. Valid values:  
- If the PeriodUnit parameter is set to Year: "1", "2", and "3".   
- If the PeriodUnit parameter is set to Month: "1", "2", "3", "6", and "12".

schema.title: 实例所在的企业资源组ID
schema.description: The ID of the resource group to which the instance belongs.

schema.title: 集群名称, 最大长度为20字符。
schema.description:
The name of the OceanBase cluster.    
It must be 1 to 20 characters in length.   
If this parameter is not specified, the value is the instance ID of the cluster by default.

schema.title: Oceanbase Server的版本号。
schema.description: OceanBase Server version number.

schema.title: 集群的存储类型。仅在标准集群版（云盘）下生效。当前支持两种类型：- cloud_essd_pl1：云盘ESSD PL1; -- cloud_essd_pl1：云盘ESSD PL1; - cloud_essd_pl0：云盘ESSD PL0。默认值为cloud_essd_pl1。
schema.description:
The type of the storage disk where the cluster is deployed. This parameter takes effect only for Standard Cluster Edition (Cloud Disk).
Valid values:
- cloud_essd_pl1: ESSD PL1.
- cloud_essd_pl0: ESSD PL0. Default value: cloud_essd_pl1.

schema.title:
是否只预检此次请求, 默认为false。取值范围：
true：发送检查请求，不会创建实例。如果检查通过，则返回DryRunResult=true, 如果检查不通过, 则返回相应错误的错误码。
false（默认）：发送正常请求，通过检查后直接创建实例。
schema.description:
Specifies whether to perform only a dry run for the request. Default value: false. Valid values:
- true: Only a dry-run request is sent and the instance is not created. If the dry run succeeds, DryRunResult=true is returned. If the dry run fails, an error code is returned.
- false: The actual request is sent and no dry run is performed. The instance is created if the requirements are met. By default, the DryRunResult parameter returns false if you set DryRun to false.

schema.title: 全功能型副本数。3: 表示3个全功能型副本; 2: 表示2个全功能型副本.
schema.description:
The number of full-featured replicas.
- 3F: three full-featured replicas.
- 2F1L: two full-featured replicas and one log replica.
- 2F1A: two full-featured replicas and one arbitration service.
- ApsaraDB for OceanBase earlier than V4.1 supports 3F and 2F1L.
- ApsaraDB for OceanBase V4.1 or later supports 3F and 2F1A.
- An ApsaraDB for OceanBase instance deployed across three zones supports only 3F.
- An ApsaraDB for OceanBase instance deployed across two zones supports 2F1A or 2F1L, depending on the version.
- An ApsaraDB for OceanBase instance deployed in a single zone supports 3F, 2F1A, or 2F1L, depending on the version.

Specifies whether to enable the control group feature.
Valid values:
- true
- false

OrderId.title: 订单ID。该参数只有创建包年包月ECS实例（请求参数InstanceChargeType=PrePaid）时有返回值。
OrderId.description:
Order ID. The ID of the order that you have placed.
This parameter returns a value after you create a pre-paid or post-paid cluster.

DryRunResult.title: 预检查请求的结果. 如果DryRun填写为true, 当预检查请求通过, 则DryRunResult返回true, 否则返回相应的错误码信息.
DryRunResult.description:
The result of the dry-run request.

If the DryRun parameter is set to true and the dry run succeeds, the DryRunResult parameter returns true. Otherwise, an error code is returned.
If the DryRun parameter is set to false, no dry run is performed and the DryRunResult parameter returns false.

InstanceClass.description:
The specifications of the cluster.  You can specify one of the following four plans:    
- 8C32G: indicates 8 CPU cores and 32 GB of memory. 
- 14C70G: indicates 14 CPU cores and 70 GB of memory. 
- 30C180G: indicates 30 CPU cores and 180 GB of memory. 
- 62C400G: indicates 62 CPU cores and 400 GB of memory.

Series.title: 实例的系列  - normal（默认）：标准集群版（云盘）  - normal_ssd：标准集群版（本地盘） - history：历史库集群版, normal_kv: obkv集群, normal_hg: 信创集群。
Series.description:
The series of the instance. Valid values:

- normal: Standard Cluster Edition (Cloud Disk). This is the default value.

- normal_ssd: Standard Cluster Edition (Local Disk)

- history: History Database Cluster Edition

PayType.title:
OceanBase 集群的付费类型
- PREPAY：预付费
- POSTPAY：按量付费
PayType.description:
The billing method of the OceanBase cluster. Valid values: 
- PREPAY: the subscription billing method. 
- POSTPAY: the pay-as-you-go billing method.

CreateTime.title: 集群的创建时间（UTC时间）。
CreateTime.description: The time in UTC when the cluster was created.

ExpireTime.title: 集群过期时间（UTC格式）。
ExpireTime.description: The time in UTC when the cluster expires.

DeployType.title:
集群的部署类型。
- multiple：多机房
- single：单机房
- dual：双机房
DeployType.description:
The deployment type of the cluster. Valid values:  
- multiple: multi-IDC deployment   
- single: single-IDC deployment   
- dual: dual-IDC deployment

DeployMode.title: 集群的数据副本模式。 单机房为n，双机房为n-n，多机房为n-n-n，其中n为各机房的observer节点数。
DeployMode.description:
The data replica distribution mode of the cluster. Valid values: - n: indicates the single-IDC mode. - n-n: indicates the dual-IDC mode. - n-n-n: indicates the multi-IDC mode. >
The integer n represents the number of OBServer nodes in each IDC.

DiskType.title: 集群部署的存储类型。默认为cloud_essd_pl1：ESSD云盘。
DiskType.description:
The type of the storage disk where the cluster is deployed. 

The default value is cloud_essd_pl1, which indicates an ESSD cloud disk.

MaintainTime.title: 集群的每天例行维护时间，UTC时间。
MaintainTime.description: The period in UTC for the daily routine maintenance of the cluster.

DataMergeTime.title: 集群的数据合并时间。
DataMergeTime.description: The time when the major compaction of cluster data is performed.

AutoRenewal.title: 是否开启自动续费。该参数只在预付费（PREPAY）集群有意义。
AutoRenewal.description:
Indicates whether automatic renewal is enabled. 

This parameter is valid only for clusters whose billing methods are set to PREPAY.

IsTrustEcs.title: 是否使用可信ecs
IsTrustEcs.description: Indicates whether trusted ECS instances are used.

Status.title:
集群状态。
- PENDING_CREATE: 创建中
- ONLINE: 运行中
- TENANT_CREATING：租户创建中
- TENANT_SPEC_MODIFYING：租户规格修改中
- EXPANDING: 节点扩容中
- REDUCING: 节点缩容中
- SPEC_UPGRADING:套餐规格扩容中
- DISK_UPGRADING:存储规格扩容中
- WHITE_LIST_MODIFYING: 修改白名单中
- PARAMETER_MODIFYING: 修改参数中
- SSL_MODIFYING: SSL变更中
- PREPAID_EXPIRE_CLOSED: 预付费集群欠费中
- ARREARS_CLOSED: 后付费集群欠费中
- PENDING_DELETE: 删除中。 集群一般为运行中的状态（ONLINE）。
Status.description:
The status of the cluster. Valid values: 
 - PENDING_CREATE: The cluster is being created. 
 - ONLINE: The cluster is running. 
 - TENANT_CREATING: The tenant is being created. 
- TENANT_SPEC_MODIFYING: The tenant specifications are being modified. 
- EXPANDING: Nodes are being added to the cluster to increase its capacity. 
- REDUCING: Nodes are being removed from the cluster to reduce its capacity. 
- SPEC_UPGRADING: The service plan is being upgraded. 
- DISK_UPGRADING: The storage space is being expanded. 
- WHITE_LIST_MODIFYING: The whitelist is being modified. 
- PARAMETER_MODIFYING: Parameters are being modified. 
- SSL_MODIFYING: The SSL certificate is being changed. 
- PREPAID_EXPIRE_CLOSED: The payment is overdue. This parameter is valid for a cluster whose billing method is set to PREPAY. 
- ARREARS_CLOSED: The payment is overdue. This parameter is valid for a cluster whose billing method is set to POSTPAY. 
- PENDING_DELETE: The cluster is being deleted.    
Generally, the cluster is in the ONLINE state.

AutoUpgradeObVersion.description: Indicates whether automatic upgrade of the OBServer version is enabled.

The ID of the zone to which the instance belongs.
<props="intl">For more information about how to obtain the list of zones, see [DescribeZones](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/en/apsaradb-for-oceanbase/latest/api-oceanbasepro-2019-09-01-describezones).</props>

The ID of the zone to which the instance belongs.
<props="intl">For more information about how to obtain the list of zones, see [DescribeZones](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/en/apsaradb-for-oceanbase/latest/api-oceanbasepro-2019-09-01-describezones).</props>

NodeNum.description: The number of nodes in the cluster. If the cluster is deployed in n-n-n mode, the number of nodes in the cluster equals n × 3.

ReplicaMode.description:
The number of full-featured replicas. Return value: 3 or 2.
- 3: three full-featured replicas.
- 2: two full-featured replicas.

An OceanBase cluster deployed in three-zone mode supports only three full-featured replicas. An OceanBase cluster deployed in two-zone mode supports only two full-featured replicas. An OceanBase cluster deployed in one single zone supports two or three full-featured replicas.

IsolationOptimization.title: 是否开启Cgroup
IsolationOptimization.description: Specifies whether to enable the control group feature.

EnableIsolationOptimization.title: 是否允许开通隔离优化
EnableIsolationOptimization.description: Specifies whether to enable isolation optimization.

InTempCapacityStatus.description: Specifies whether to indicate the temporary status of the capacity.

DataDiskAutoScale.title: 是否开启数据自动协调
DataDiskAutoScale.description:
Specifies whether to enable automatic scaling of the data disk. >
This parameter is deprecated.

TenantCreatable.description: Specifies whether a tenant can be created.

EnableCreateTenant.title: 集群是否允许创建租户
EnableCreateTenant.description: Specifies whether a tenant can be created.

DisableCreateTenantReason.title: 集群不允许创建租户的原因
DisableCreateTenantReason.description: The reason why you cannot create a tenant in the cluster.

DataDiskAutoScaleConfig.title: 数据盘自动协调配置
DataDiskAutoScaleConfig.description: Specifies parameters for the automatic scaling of the data disk.

AutoScale.title: 是否开启
AutoScale.description: Specifies whether to enable the automatic scaling of the data disk.

Upperbound.title: 扩容上限
Upperbound.description: The maximum space, in GB, to which the data disk can be scaled.

UpperThreshold.title: 日常扩容阈值
UpperThreshold.description: The maximum usage of the data disk, in percentage, that triggers the scaling of the data disk for daily use.

UpperMergeThreshold.title: 合并扩容阈值
UpperMergeThreshold.description: The maximum usage of the data disk, in percentage, that triggers the scaling of the data disk for major compactions.

MaxDiskSize.title: 磁盘最大值
MaxDiskSize.description: The maximum size of the disk, in GB.

ScaleStepInNormal.title: 日常扩容步长
ScaleStepInNormal.description: The size of scaling step during daily use.

ScaleStepInMerge.title: 合并扩容步长
ScaleStepInMerge.description: The size of scaling step during a major compaction.

UpperScaleStrategy.title: 扩容策略（RAW/PERCENTAGE）
UpperScaleStrategy.description: The scale-out strategy. Valid values: RAW and PERCENTAGE.

UpperScaleStep.title: 扩容步长
UpperScaleStep.description: The step size of the scale-out.

EnableProxyService.description:
Specifies whether to enable the proxy service.
- true
- false

ProxyServiceStatus.title: 代理服务状态
ProxyServiceStatus.description: The status of the proxy service.

ProxyClusterId.title: 代理集群 ID
ProxyClusterId.description:
The ID of the proxy cluster.
> This parameter returns a value only if you set the **EnableProxyService** parameter to true.

CpuArchitecture.title: 集群的 CPU 架构
CpuArchitecture.description: The CPU architecture of the cluster.

Cpu.title: 集群的CPU资源信息

TotalCpu.description: The total number of CPU cores of the cluster.

UsedCpu.title: 集群已使用的CPU，单位：核数
UsedCpu.description: The number of CPU cores used by the cluster.

UnitCpu.title: 集群中每个副本节点的CPU，单位：核数
UnitCpu.description: The number of CPU cores of each replica node in the cluster.

OriginalTotalCpu.title: 原始CPU
OriginalTotalCpu.description: The number of original CPU cores in the cluster.

Memory.title: 集群的内存资源信息

TotalMemory.description: The total memory size of the cluster, in GB.

UsedMemory.title: 集群已使用的内存，单位：GB
UsedMemory.description: The size of memory used by the cluster, in GB.

UnitMemory.title: 集群中每个副本的内存，单位：GB
UnitMemory.description: The memory size of each replica node in the cluster, in GB.

OriginalTotalMemory.title: 原始内存

DiskSize.title: 集群的存储资源信息

TotalDiskSize.description: The total storage space of the cluster, in GB.

UsedDiskSize.title: 集群已使用的存储空间，单位：GB
UsedDiskSize.description: The size of used storage space of the cluster, in GB.

UnitDiskSize.title: 集群每个副本的存储空间，单位：GB
UnitDiskSize.description: The storage space of each replica node in the cluster, in GB.

DataUsedSize.description: The size of the data disk, in GB.

MaxDiskUsedPercent.description: The maximum disk usage, in percentage.

MaxDiskUsedObServer.description: The maximum disk usage of the OBServer node.

items.description: The maximum disk usage of the OBServer node.

OriginalTotalDiskSize.description: The original size of the disk.

MaxDiskSize.title: 最大可创建磁盘大小

UnitCount.title: 集群的资源Unit数量。

LogDiskSize.title: 集群的日志盘资源信息

TotalDiskSize.description: The information about the log disk space of the cluster.

UnitDiskSize.title: 集群每个副本的日志存储空间，单位：GB
UnitDiskSize.description: The log disk space of each replica node in the cluster, in GB.

LogAssignedSize.description: The allocated disk space for log storage, in GB.

MaxLogAssignedObServer.description: The maximum storage space allocated for.

AllowCreateProxySqlFirewallRule.description: Indicates whether the OceanBase Database Proxy (ODP) SQL firewall is supported.

DescribeInstance.title: DescribeInstance

DescribeInstances.summary: You can call this operation to obtain the list of OceanBase clusters.

schema.title: Oceanbase集群ID。
schema.description: The ID of the OceanBase cluster.

schema.title: 资源组ID信息。如果不填写，返回全部资源。
schema.description: The ID of the resource group. If you do not specify this parameter, all resources are returned.

schema.title: 分页查询时设置的每页行数。 最大值：100 默认值：10
schema.description:
The number of rows to return on each page.
- Maximum value: 100.
- Default value: 10.

schema.title: 分页查询的页码。 起始值：1 默认值：1
schema.description:
The number of the page to return.
- Pages start from page 1.
- Default value: 1.

schema.title: Oceanbase集群名称。 长度为1~20个英文或中文字符。如果没有指定该参数，默认值为集群的InstanceId。
schema.description: The name of the OceanBase cluster. It must be 1 to 20 characters in length. If this parameter is not specified, the value is the instance ID of the cluster by default.

schema.title: 查询列表的删选关键字。
schema.description: The keyword for fuzzy search, which can be an instance ID, instance name, tenant ID, or tenant name.

schema.title: 请求的返回结果。
schema.description: The return result of the request.

Instances.title: Oceanbase集群列表。
Instances.description: The information of the OceanBase cluster.

items.description: The information of the OceanBase cluster.

CommodityCode.title: Oceanbase集群的产品码。 - oceanbase_oceanbasepre_public_cn：国内站云数据库包年包月套餐。 - oceanbase_oceanbasepost_public_cn：国内站云数据库按小时付费套餐。 - oceanbase_obpre_public_intl：国际站云数据库包年包月套餐。
CommodityCode.description:
The product code of the OceanBase cluster.   
- oceanbase_oceanbasepre_public_cn: indicates an OceanBase cluster that is billed based on the subscription plan and that is deployed in a China site.  
- oceanbase_oceanbasepost_public_cn: indicates an OceanBase cluster that is billed based on the pay-as-you-go plan and that is deployed in a China site.  
- oceanbase_obpre_public_intl: indicates an OceanBase cluster that is billed based on the subscription plan and that is deployed in an international site.

ExpireTime.title: 集群过期时间（UTC格式）。
ExpireTime.description:
The time in UTC when the cluster expires. 
> This parameter is valid only for subscription instances.

State.title: 集群状态。 - PENDING_CREATE: 创建中 - ONLINE: 运行中 - TENANT_CREATING：租户创建中 - TENANT_SPEC_MODIFYING：租户规格修改中 - EXPANDING: 节点扩容中 - REDUCING: 节点缩容中 - SPEC_UPGRADING:套餐规格扩容中 - DISK_UPGRADING:存储规格扩容中 - WHITE_LIST_MODIFYING: 修改白名单中 - PARAMETER_MODIFYING: 修改参数中 - SSL_MODIFYING: SSL变更中 - PREPAID_EXPIRE_CLOSED: 预付费集群欠费中 - ARREARS_CLOSED: 后付费集群欠费中 - PENDING_DELETE: 删除中。 集群一般为运行中的状态（ONLINE）。
State.description:
The status of the cluster. Valid values:   
- ONLINE: The cluster is running.  
- PENDING_CREATE: The cluster is being created.  
- ARREARS_CLOSED("arrears_closed"): The cluster is suspended due to insufficient balance.
- PREPAID_EXPIRE_CLOSED("prepaid_expire_closed"): The cluster is suspended because the subscription has expired.
- WHITE_LIST_MODIFYING("white_list_modifying"): The allowlist of the cluster is being modified.
- SSL_MODIFYING("ssl_modifying"): The Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) settings of the cluster are being modified.
- PARAMETER_MODIFYING("parameter_modifying"): Parameters of the cluster are being modified.
- TENANT_CREATING("tenant_creating"): A tenant is being created in the cluster.
- TENANT_SPEC_MODIFYING("tenant_spec_modifying"): The specifications of a tenant in the cluster are being modified.
- EXPANDING("expanding"): Nodes are being added to the cluster.
- REDUCING("reducing"): Nodes are being removed from the cluster.
- ZONE_CHANGING("zone_changing"): Zones of the cluster are being modified.
- SPEC_UPGRADING: The service plan is being upgraded.
- SPEC_DOWNGRADING("spec_downgrading"): The plan specification is being downgraded.
- DISK_UPGRADING: The storage space is being expanded.
- UPGRADING("upgrading"): The version of the cluster is being upgraded.
- PENDING_DELETE("pending_delete"): The cluster is being deleted.
- DELETED("deleted"): The cluster has been deleted.
- ABNORMAL("abnormal"): The cluster is abnormal.
- OFFLINE("offline"): The cluster is offline.
- STANDBY_CREATING("standby_creating"): A standby cluster is being created for the cluster.
- STANDBY_DELETING("standby_deleting"): A standby cluster of the cluster is being deleted.
- SWITCHOVER_SWITCHING("switchover_switching"): The cluster is undergoing a primary/standby switchover.
- STANDBY_DISCONNECTING("standby_disconnecting"): The cluster is being decoupled from its standby cluster.
- LOG_DISK_UPGRADING("log_disk_upgrading"): The log disk of the cluster is being scaled out.
- ISOLATION_OPTIMIZATION_MODIFYING("isolation_optimization_modifying"): The isolation optimization settings of the cluster are being modified.
- DISKTYPE_MODIFYING("disktype_modifying"): The data disk type of the cluster is being modified.
- PROXY_SERVICE_CREATING("proxy_service_creating"): The proxy service is being enabled for the cluster.
- PROXY_SERVICE_DELETING("proxy_service_deleting"): The proxy service is being disabled for the cluster.
- PROXY_SERVICE_SPEC_MODIFYING("proxy_service_spec_modifying"): The proxy service specification is being modified for the cluster.
- READONLY_ADD_NODE("readonly_add_node"): A read-only node is being added to the cluster.
- READONLY_REDUCE_NODE("readonly_reduce_node"): A read-only node is being removed from the cluster.
- READONLY_REDUCE_ZONE("readonly_reduce_zone"): A read-only zone is being removed from the cluster.
- READONLY_ADD_ZONE("readonly_add_zone"): A read-only zone is being added to the cluster.
- READONLY_UPGRADE_SPEC("readonly_upgrade_spec"): The specification of read-only replicas is being upgraded.
- READONLY_UPGRADE_DISK("readonly_upgrade_disk"): The disk space of read-only replicas is being scaled out.
- READONLY_DOWNGRADE_SPEC("readonly_downgrade_spec"): The specification of read-only replicas is being downgraded.
- READONLY_DOWNGRADE_DISK("readonly_downgrade_disk"): The disk space of read-only replicas is being scaled in.
- CREATING_TENANT_READONLY_REPLICA("creating_tenant_readonly_replica"): A read-only replica is being created for a tenant in the cluster.
- DELETING_TENANT_READONLY_REPLICA("deleting_tenant_readonly_replica"): A read-only replica is being deleted for a tenant in the cluster.
- DISK_DOWNGRADING("disk_downgrading"): The disk space of the cluster is being scaled in.
- DEPLOY_MODE_MODIFYING("deploy_mode_modifying"): The deployment mode of the cluster is being modified.
> Generally, the cluster is in the ONLINE state.

InstanceClass.description:
The specifications of the cluster.  You can specify one of the following four plans:  
- 8C32G: indicates 8 CPU cores and 32 GB of memory.  
- 14C70G: indicates 14 CPU cores and 70 GB of memory.  
- 30C180G: indicates 30 CPU cores and 180 GB of memory.  
- 62C400G: indicates 62 CPU cores and 400 GB of memory.

CreateTime.title: 集群的创建时间，UTC时间。
CreateTime.description: The time in UTC when the cluster was created.

DeployMode.title: 集群的数据副本模式。 单机房为n，双机房为n-n，多机房为n-n-n，其中n为各机房的observer节点数。
DeployMode.description: The data replica distribution mode of the cluster. The value is in the n-n-n format, where n is the number of OBServer nodes in each IDC.

CpuArchitecture.title: 集群的 CPU 架构
CpuArchitecture.description: The CPU architecture of the cluster.

MaintainTime.title: 集群的每天例行维护时间，UTC时间。
MaintainTime.description: The time period in UTC for the daily routine maintenance of the cluster.

DeployType.title: 集群的部署类型。 - multiple：多机房 - single：单机房 - dual：双机房
DeployType.description:
The deployment type of the cluster. Valid values:   
- multiple: multi-IDC deployment  
- single: single-IDC deployment  
- dual: dual-IDC deployment

PayType.title: Oceanbase集群的付费类型 - PREPAY：预付费 - POSTPAY：按量付费
PayType.description:
The billing method for the OceanBase cluster. Valid values:  
- PREPAY: the subscription billing method.  
- POSTPAY: the pay-as-you-go billing method.

DiskSize.description: The size of the storage space, in GB.
DiskSize.title: The size of the storage space, in GB.

DiskType.title: 集群部署的存储类型。默认为cloud_essd_pl1：ESSD云盘。
DiskType.description:
The type of the storage disk where the cluster is deployed.   
The default value is cloud_essd_pl1, which indicates an ESSD cloud disk.

InstanceId.title: Oceanbase集群ID。
InstanceId.description: The ID of the OceanBase cluster.

ExpireSeconds.title: 集群已过期时间，单位：秒(s)。
ExpireSeconds.description:
The time elapsed since the expiration of the cluster, in seconds. 
> In subscription mode, if the cluster has not expired, this parameter indicates the remaining validity period of the cluster. If the cluster has expired, this parameter indicates the time elapsed since the expiration.

Mem.title: 实例的内存大小，单位GB。
Mem.description: The memory size of the instance, in GB.

EnableUpgradeNodes.title: 是否允许新增节点。
EnableUpgradeNodes.description: Indicates whether new nodes can be added.

Cpu.title: 集群的CPU核数。
Cpu.description: The number of CPU cores of the cluster.

AvailableZones.title: 集群部署所在的可用区信息。
AvailableZones.description: The information about the zone in which the cluster is deployed.

items.description: The information about the zone in which the cluster is deployed.

InstanceName.title: Oceanbase集群名称。
InstanceName.description: The name of the OceanBase cluster.

Series.title: 实例的系列  - normal（默认）：标准集群版（云盘）  - normal_ssd：标准集群版（本地盘） - history：历史库集群版, normal_kv: obkv集群, normal_hg: 信创集群。
Series.description:
The series of the OceanBase cluster. Valid values:   
- NORMAL: the high availability edition.   
- BASIC: the basic edition.

UsedDiskSize.title: 已使用的存储空间，单位GB。
UsedDiskSize.description: The size of used storage space of the cluster, in GB.

ResourceGroupId.title: 资源组ID信息。
ResourceGroupId.description: The ID of the resource group.

Cpu.description: The information about the CPU resources of the cluster.

TotalCpu.description: The total number of CPU cores of the cluster.
TotalCpu.title: The total number of CPU cores of the cluster.

UsedCpu.description: The number of CPU cores used in the cluster.
UsedCpu.title: The number of CPU cores used in the cluster.

UnitCpu.title: The number of CPU cores of each replica node in the cluster.

UsedMemory.description: The size of used memory in the cluster, in GB.

The status of the resource unit. Valid values: 
* ONLINE: The resource unit is running. 
* IMMIGRATING: The resource unit is being immigrated.

* CANCEL_EMIGRATING: The immigration of the resource unit is being canceled. 
* CANCEL_EMIGRATING: The emigration of the resource unit is being canceled. 
* DELETING: The resource unit is being deleted.

EnableCancelMigrateUnit.description: Indicates whether the migration can be canceled. This parameter is valid only for resource units that are being manually immigrated or emigrated.

ReplicaType.description:
The type of the replica. Node filtering conditions are configured based on the replica type when you query the monitoring data of the OceanBase cluster. 
* By default, the replica type is not specified when you query the monitoring data of OceanBase clusters or the access proxy. If you do not specify the replica type when you query the monitoring data of an OceanBase cluster, the monitoring data of all nodes is queried. 
* If you set the replica type to FULL when you query the monitoring data of an OceanBase cluster, the monitoring data of only the full-featured replica nodes is queried. 
* If you set the replica type to READONLY when you query the monitoring data of an OceanBase cluster, the monitoring data of only the read-only replica nodes is queried.

TenantStatus.description:
The status of the tenant. Valid values: 
* PENDING_CREATE: The tenant is being created. 
* RESTORE: The tenant is being restored. 
* ONLINE: The tenant is running. 
* SPEC_MODIFYING: The specification of the tenant is being modified. 
* ALLOCATING_INTERNET_ADDRESS: A public IP address is being allocated to the tenant. 
* PENDING_OFFLINE_INTERNET_ADDRESS: The public IP address is being disabled. 
* PRIMARY_ZONE_MODIFYING: The tenant is being switched to a new primary zone. 
* PARAMETER_MODIFYING: Parameters are being modified. 
* WHITE_LIST_MODIFYING: The allowlist is being modified.

ModifyInstanceSpec.summary: You can call this operation to modify the cluster specifications and storage space.

schema.title: Oceanbase集群的ID。
schema.description: The ID of the OceanBase cluster.

schema.title:
集群规格信息。
当前支持以下套餐：
- 4C16GB：4核 16GB
- 8C32GB：8核 32GB
- 14C70GB：14核 70GB
- 24C120GB：24核 120GB
- 30C180GB：30核 180GB
- 62C400GB：62核 400GB
- 104C600GB：104核 600GB
- 16C70GB：16核 70GB
- 32C160GB：32核 160GB
- 64C380GB：64核 380GB
- 20C32GB：20核 32GB
- 40C64GB：40核 64GB
- 16C32GB：16核 32GB
- 32C70GB：32核 70GB
- 64C180GB：64核 180GB
- 32C180GB：32核 180GB
- 64C400GB：64核 400GB。
schema.description:
The specifications of the cluster. You can specify one of the following four plans:
- 8C32GB: indicates 8 CPU cores and 32 GB of memory.
- 14C70GB: indicates 14 CPU cores and 70 GB of memory. This is the default value.
- 30C180GB: indicates 30 CPU cores and 180 GB of memory.
- 62C400GB: indicates 62 CPU cores and 400 GB of memory.

schema.title: 存储空间大小，单位GB。 存储空间的限制根据集群规格不同而不同，具体如下： - 8C32G：100GB~10TB - 14C70G：200GB~10TB - 30C180G：400GB~10TB - 62C400G：800GB-10TB。 各套餐的存储空间默认值为其最小值。
schema.description:
The size of the storage space, in GB. The required storage space varies based on the cluster specifications:
- 8C32G: 100 GB to 10 TB.
- 14C70G: 200 GB to 10 TB.
- 30C180G: 400 GB to 10 TB.
- 62C400G: 800 GB to 10 TB. The preceding minimum storage space sizes are the default storage space sizes of the corresponding cluster specification plans.

schema.title:
是否只预检此次请求, 默认为false。取值范围：
true：发送检查请求，不会更改实例配置。如果检查通过，则返回DryRunResult=true, 如果检查不通过, 则返回相应错误的错误码。
false（默认）：发送正常请求，通过检查后直接更改实例配置。
schema.description:
Specifies whether to perform only a dry run for the request. Default value: false. Valid values:
- true: Only a dry-run request is sent and the instance settings are not modified. If the dry run succeeds, DryRunResult=true is returned. If the dry run fails, an error code is returned.
- false: If the DryRun parameter is set to false, no dry run is performed and the DryRunResult parameter returns false.

schema.title: 存储类型

DryRunResult.description:
The result of the dry-run request.
- If the DryRun parameter is set to true and the dry run succeeds, the DryRunResult parameter returns true. Otherwise, an error code is returned.
- If the DryRun parameter is set to false, no dry run is performed and the DryRunResult parameter returns false.

schema.title: Oceanbase集群的ID
schema.description: The ID of the OceanBase cluster.

schema.title: 集群节点个数信息。 如果部署模式为n-n-n，则节点个数为n * 3
schema.description: The number of nodes in the cluster. If the cluster is deployed in n-n-n mode, the number of nodes in the cluster equals n × 3.

schema.title:
是否只预检此次请求, 默认为false。取值范围：
true：发送检查请求，不会更改实例节点数。如果检查通过，则返回DryRunResult=true, 如果检查不通过, 则返回相应错误的错误码。
false（默认）：发送正常请求，通过检查后直接更改实例节点数。
schema.description:
Specifies whether to perform only a dry run for the request. Default value: false. Valid values:
- true: Only a dry-run request is sent and the number of nodes in the instance is not modified. If the dry run succeeds, DryRunResult=true is returned. If the dry run fails, an error code is returned.
- false: The actual request is sent and no dry run is performed. The number of nodes is changed if the requirements are met. By default, the DryRunResult parameter returns false if you set DryRun to false.

schema.title: 请求的返回结果
schema.description: The return result of the request.

DryRunResult.description:
The result of the dry-run request.
- If the DryRun parameter is set to true and the dry run succeeds, the DryRunResult parameter returns true. Otherwise, an error code is returned.
- If the DryRun parameter is set to false, no dry run is performed and the DryRunResult parameter returns false.

DeleteInstances.summary: You can call this operation to release an OceanBase cluster.

schema.title: 要删除的集群ID。格式为son数组的字符串。
schema.description:
The ID of the cluster to be deleted.   
The value is a string in the JSON format.

schema.title: 集群删除后的备份保留策略。取值如下： - receive_all：保留全部备份集; - delete_all：删除全部备份集； - receive_last：保留最后一个备份集。 默认值为delete_all。
schema.description:
The backup retention strategy for cluster deletion. Valid values: - receive_all: retains all backup sets. - delete_all: deletes all backup sets. - receive_last: retains the last backup set. >
Default value: delete_all.

schema.title:
是否只预检此次请求, 默认为false。取值范围：
true：发送检查请求，不会删除实例。如果检查通过，则返回DryRunResult=true, 如果检查不通过, 则返回相应错误的错误码。
false（默认）：发送正常请求，通过检查后直接删除实例。
schema.description:
Specifies whether to perform only a dry run for the request. Default value: false. Valid values:
- true: Only a dry-run request is sent and the instance is not deleted. If the dry run succeeds, DryRunResult=true is returned. If the dry run fails, an error code is returned.
- false: The actual request is sent and no dry run is performed. The instance is deleted if the requirements are met. By default, false is returned for the parameter DryRunResult if you set DryRun to false.
The return result of the request.

Data.description: The returned data.

DryRunResult.title: 预检查请求的结果. 如果DryRun填写为true, 当预检查请求通过, 则DryRunResult返回true, 否则返回相应的错误码信息.
DryRunResult.description:
The result of the dry-run request.
- If the DryRun parameter is set to true and the dry run succeeds, the DryRunResult parameter returns true. Otherwise, an error code is returned.
- If the DryRun parameter is set to false, no dry run is performed and the DryRunResult parameter returns false.

500.errorMessage: InternalServerError

schema.title: 租户名称。 长度为2~20 个字符，支持英文字母、数字和下划线，区分大小写，必须以字母或下划线开头。 不可设置为 sys。
schema.description:
The name of the tenant.    
It must start with a letter or an underscore (_), and contain 2 to 20 characters, which can be uppercase letters, lowercase letters, digits, and underscores (_).  It cannot be set to sys.

schema.title: 租户的CPU大小，单位：核数（Cores）
schema.description:
The number of CPU cores of the tenant. >
The CPU specification of a single tenant cannot exceed that of the corresponding cluster.
For example, if the specification of the cluster is 14 CPU cores and 70 GB of memory, the CPU specification of the tenant cannot exceed 14 cores.

schema.title: 租户内存大小，单位GB。
schema.description:
The memory size of the tenant, in GB. >
The memory size of a single tenant cannot exceed that of the corresponding cluster.
For example, if the specification of the cluster is 14 CPU cores and 70 GB of memory, the memory size of the tenant cannot exceed 70 GB.

The status of the tenant.
- PENDING_CREATE: The tenant is being created. - RESTORE: The tenant is being recovered. - ONLINE: The tenant is running. - SPEC_MODIFYING: The specification of the tenant is being modified. ALLOCATING_INTERNET_ADDRESS: An Internet address is being allocated. PENDING_OFFLINE_INTERNET_ADDRESS: The Internet address is being disabled. - PRIMARY_ZONE_MODIFYING: The tenant is switching to a new primary zone. - PARAMETER_MODIFYING: Parameters are being modified. - WHITE_LIST_MODIFYING: The whitelist is being modified.

N represents the number of nodes in a single zone.

Status.title: 租户的状态。 PENDING_CREATE: 创建中 RESTORE: 恢复中 ONLINE: 运行中 SPEC_MODIFYING: 规格修改中 ALLOCATING_INTERNET_ADDRESS: 公网地址分配中 PENDING_OFFLINE_INTERNET_ADDRESS: 公网地址关闭中 PRIMARY_ZONE_MODIFYING: 切主可用区中 PARAMETER_MODIFYING: 参数修改中 WHITE_LIST_MODIFING: 白名单修改中
Status.description:
The status of the tenant.

- ONLINE: The tenant is running.

- PENDING_CREATE: The tenant is being created.

- WAITING_ALLOCATE_MASTER_ADDRESS: The standby cluster is waiting for the primary address to be created.

- ALLOCATING_MASTER_ADDRESS: The primary address is being created.

- DELETING_MASTER_ADDRESS: The primary address is being deleted.

- ALLOCATING_INTERNET_ADDRESS: The Internet address is being created.

- PENDING_OFFLINE_INTERNET_ADDRESS: The Internet address is being deleted.

- ALLOCATING_READONLY_ADDRESS: The read-only address is being created.

- DELETING_READONLY_ADDRESS: The read-only address is being deleted.

- ALLOCATING_READWRITE_ADDRESS: The read/write splitting address is being created.

- DELETING_READWRITE_ADDRESS: The read/write splitting address is being deleted.

- ALLOCATING_CLOGSERVICE_ADDRESS: The clog address is being created.

- DELETING_CLOGSERVICE_ADDRESS: The clog address is being deleted.

- MODIFYING_ADDRESS: The domain name of the address is being modified.

- MODIFYING_PRIMARY_ZONE: The primary zone is being switched.

- MODIFYING_READONLY_ADDRESS: The read-only address is being modified.

- MODIFYING_READWRITE_ADDRESS: The read/write splitting address is being modified.

- SPEC_MODIFYING: The specifications of the tenant are being modified.

- WHITE_LIST_MODIFYING: The allowlist is being modified.

- CREATING_BINLOG: Binlogs are being created.

TenantZoneRole.description: The role of the zone of the tenant.

TenantZoneReplicas.description: The zone replicas of the tenant.

items.description: The zone replicas of the tenant.

ZoneReplicaType.description: The type of the zone replica.

ZoneNodes.description: The number of nodes in the zone.

LogicZoneName.description: The name of the logical zone.

ZoneCopyId.description: The ID of the zone replica.

FullCopyId.description: The ID of the full-featured replica.

ReadOnlyCopyId.description: The ID of the read-only replica.

ReadOnlyReplicaType.description: The type of the read-only replica.

ClogServiceStatus.title: Clog服务开启状态。 CLOSED: 关闭 ONLINE：服务中
ClogServiceStatus.description:
The enabling status of the clog service.  
- CLOSED: The clog service is disabled.  
- ONLINE: The clog service is running.

EnableClogService.title: 是否可使用Clog服务，如需开启，请工单联系。
EnableClogService.description: Indicates whether the clog service is available. To enable the clog service, submit a ticket.

PrimaryZoneDeployType.title: 租户主可用区部署模式
PrimaryZoneDeployType.description: The deployment type of the primary zone.

MasterIntranetAddressZone.title: 租户主地址可用区
MasterIntranetAddressZone.description: The zone where the primary node is located.

items.description: The list of zones.

EnableReadWriteSplit.title: 是否允许开启读写分离地址
EnableReadWriteSplit.description: Indicates whether to enable read/write splitting endpoint.

EnableParallelQuery.title: 是否允许开通并行查询
EnableParallelQuery.description: Indicates whether parallel query can be enabled.

EnableBinlogService.title: 是否可以申请Binlog服务
EnableBinlogService.description: Indicates whether the binlog service is available for application.

TimeZone.title: 租户所在时区。 详细参见：DescribeTimeZones。

DataMergeTime.title: 租户合并时间，仅对4.0以上OB版本有效
DataMergeTime.description: The major compaction time of the tenant. This parameter is supported only in OceanBase Database V4.0.0 and later.

UnitNum.title: 租户的unit个数。
UnitNum.description: The number of resource units in the tenant.

Cpu.description: The number of CPU cores of each replica node in the cluster.

UsedCpu.description: The number of CPU cores used by the cluster.

TotalCpu.title: 租户总的CPU核数，单位：Core。
TotalCpu.description: The total number of CPU cores of the tenant.

UnitCpu.title: 租户每个Unit的CPU核数，单位：Core。
UnitCpu.description: The number of CPU cores in each resource unit of the tenant.

Memory.description: The information about the memory resources of the cluster.

UsedMemory.title: 租户已使用的内存，单位：GB。
UsedMemory.description: The size of memory used by the tenant, in GB.

TotalMemory.title: 租户总的内存大小，单位：GB。
TotalMemory.description: The total memory size of the tenant, in GB.

UnitMemory.title: 租户每个Unit的内存大小，单位：GB。
UnitMemory.description: The memory size of each resource unit of the tenant, in GB.

DiskSize.description: The size of the data disk.

UsedDiskSize.title: 租户已使用的磁盘大小，单位：GB。
UsedDiskSize.description: The size of disk space used by the tenant, in GB.

MaxCapacityUnit.title: 最大容量单元
MaxCapacityUnit.description: The maximum number of capacity units.

MinCapacityUnit.title: 最小容量单元
MinCapacityUnit.description: The minimum number of capacity units.

UsedCapacit.title: 已使用容量单元
UsedCapacit.description: The number of used capacity units.

LogDiskSize.description: The information about the log disk resources of the tenant.

TotalLogDisk.description: The total log disk size of the tenant, in GB.

UnitLogDisk.description: The log disk size of each resource unit of the tenant, in GB.

EnableReadOnlyReplica.description: Indicates whether read-only replicas are supported.

RecycleBinStatus.title: 表示租户回收站状态，ON表示开启，OFF表示关闭
RecycleBinStatus.description:
The status of the recycle bin in the tenant. Valid values: 
* ON: The recycly bin is enabled. 
* OFF: The recycle bin is disabled.

LowerCaseTableNames.description:
Indicates whether the table name is case-sensitive. Valid values: 
* **1**: The table name is case-insensitive. 
* **0**: The table name is case-sensitive.

TenantMaxConnections.title: 租户允许的最大连接数
TenantMaxConnections.description: The maximum number of connections allowed in the tenant.

schema.description: The ID of the OceanBase cluster.

schema.title: 租户ID。
schema.description: The ID of the tenant.

schema.title: 数据库账号名称。 不能使用某些预留关键字，如 SYS、root等。
schema.description: The name of the database account.  You cannot use reserved keywords, such as SYS and root.

schema.title: 数据库账户的类型 Admin：超级账户 Normal：普通账户
schema.description: The type of the database account. Valid values: Admin: the super administrator account. Normal: a general account.

schema.title: 数据库账号访问密码。 必须包含大写英文字符、小写英文字符、数字、特殊字符占三种，长度为 10-32 位； 特殊字符为：!@#$%^&* ()_ +-=
schema.description: The password of the database account.  It must be 10 to 32 characters in length and contain three types of the following characters: uppercase letters, lowercase letters, digits, and special characters. The special characters are ! @ # $ % \ ^ \ & \ * ( ) _ + - =

schema.title: 用户的角色信息。 对于Oracle模式：无需填写。 对于MySQL模式：超级账户默认为ALL PRIVILEGES，无需填写。 普通用户填写账户的信息，其为Json格式的字符串，默认为一个数组，数组内包含schema（Oracle模式）或Database（MySQL模式)信息和角色信息（Role）。 角色包含以下几类： 读写权限（ReadWrite）：ALL PRIVILEGES ； 只读权限（ReadOnly）：SELECT DDL权限（DDL）：CREATE,DROP,ALTER,SHOW VIEW,CREATE VIEW DML权限：SELECT,INSERT,UPDATE,DELETE,SHOW VIEW； DML权限（DML）：SELECT,INSERT,UPDATE,DELETE,SHOW VIEW。
schema.description: The role of the user account.  In Oracle mode, this parameter unspecified is left unspecified.  In MySQL mode, the super administrator account has ALL PRIVILEGES, and you can leave this parameter unspecified.  You need to specify the account information for a general user account. By default, the account information is a JSON array that contains the information of the role and the schema (Oracle mode) or database (MySQL mode).  Valid values: ReadWrite: a role that has the read and write privileges, namely ALL PRIVILEGES. ReadOnly: a role that has only the read-only privilege SELECT. DDL: a role that has DDL privileges such as CREATE, DROP, ALTER, SHOW VIEW, and CREATE VIEW. DML: a role that has DML privileges such as SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, and SHOW VIEW.

schema.title: 数据库描述信息。
schema.description: The description of the database.

schema.title: 加密方式。

UserType.description: The type of the database account. Valid values:  - Admin: the super administrator account. - Normal: a general account.

Roles.name: Roles
Roles.title:
The type of the database account. Valid values:   
 - Admin: the super administrator account.   
 - Normal: a general account.

items.description: The roles of the accounts.

Role.name: Role
Role.title: The name of the database.
Role.description:
The role of the account.  In Oracle mode, a role is a schema-level role. Valid values: - ReadWrite: a role that has the read and write privileges, including CREATE TABLE, CREATE VIEW, CREATE PROCEDURE, CREATE SYNONYM, CREATE SEQUENCE, CREATE TRIGGER, CREATE TYPE, CREATE SESSION, EXECUTE ANY PROCEDURE, CREATE ANY OUTLINE, ALTER ANY OUTLINE, DROP ANY OUTLINE, CREATE ANY PROCEDURE, ALTER ANY PROCEDURE, DROP ANY PROCEDURE, CREATE ANY SEQUENCE, ALTER ANY SEQUENCE, DROP ANY SEQUENCE, CREATE ANY TYPE, ALTER ANY TYPE, DROP ANY TYPE, SYSKM, CREATE ANY TRIGGER, ALTER ANY TRIGGER, DROP ANY TRIGGER, CREATE PROFILE, ALTER PROFILE, and DROP PROFILE. - ReadOnly: a role that has only the read-only privilege SELECT.
In MySQL mode, a role is a database-level role. Valid values: - ReadWrite: a role that has the read and write privileges, namely ALL PRIVILEGES. - ReadOnly: a role that has only the read-only privilege SELECT. - DDL: a role that has the DDL privileges such as CREATE, DROP, ALTER, SHOW VIEW, and CREATE VIEW. - DML: a role that has the DML privileges such as SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, and SHOW VIEW. 
* By default, an Oracle account has the read and write privileges on its own schema, which are not listed here.

UserStatus.name: UserStatus
UserStatus.title:
The role of the account. In Oracle mode, a role is a schema-level role. Valid values: - ReadWrite: a role that has the read and write privileges, including CREATE TABLE, CREATE VIEW, CREATE PROCEDURE, CREATE SYNONYM, CREATE SEQUENCE, CREATE TRIGGER, CREATE TYPE, CREATE SESSION, EXECUTE ANY PROCEDURE, CREATE ANY OUTLINE, ALTER ANY OUTLINE, DROP ANY OUTLINE, CREATE ANY PROCEDURE, ALTER ANY PROCEDURE, DROP ANY PROCEDURE, CREATE ANY SEQUENCE, ALTER ANY SEQUENCE, DROP ANY SEQUENCE, CREATE ANY TYPE, ALTER ANY TYPE, DROP ANY TYPE, SYSKM, CREATE ANY TRIGGER, ALTER ANY TRIGGER, DROP ANY TRIGGER, CREATE PROFILE, ALTER PROFILE, and DROP PROFILE. - ReadOnly: a role that has only the read-only privilege SELECT. In MySQL mode, a role is a database-level role. Valid values: - ReadWrite: a role that has the read and write privileges, namely ALL PRIVILEGES. - ReadOnly: a role that has only the read-only privilege SELECT. - DDL: a role that has the DDL privileges such as CREATE, DROP, ALTER, SHOW VIEW, and CREATE VIEW. - DML: a role that has the DML privileges such as SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, and SHOW VIEW. >
By default, an Oracle account has the read and write privileges on its own schema, which are not listed here.
UserStatus.description: The status of the database account. Valid values:  - Locked: The account is locked. - ONLINE: The account is unlocked. The default status of a new account is ONLINE after it is created.

UserName.name: UserName
UserName.title:
The status of the database account. Valid values:    
- Locked: The account is locked.   
- ONLINE: The account is unlocked. The default status of a new account is ONLINE after it is created.
UserName.description: The name of the database account.

Roles.title: 账户对应的角色权限信息

Role.title:
拥有的角色。 对于Oracle模式，角色为schema级别，其可分为 - ReadWrite：读写权限，包括CREATE TABLE CREATE VIEW CREATE PROCEDURE CREATE SYNONYM CREATE SEQUENCE CREATE TRIGGER CREATE TYPE CREATE SESSION EXECUTE ANY PROCEDURE CREATE ANY OUTLINE ALTER ANY OUTLINE DROP ANY OUTLINE CREATE ANY PROCEDURE ALTER ANY PROCEDURE DROP ANY PROCEDURE CREATE ANY SEQUENCE ALTER ANY SEQUENCE DROP ANY SEQUENCE CREATE ANY TYPE ALTER ANY TYPE DROP ANY TYPE SYSKM CREATE ANY TRIGGER ALTER ANY TRIGGER DROP ANY TRIGGER CREATE PROFILE ALTER PROFILE DROP PROFILE； - ReadOnly：只读权限，SELECT
对于MySQL模式，角色为数据库（Database）级别，其有以下几类： - ReadWrite：读写权限，包括ALL PRIVILEGES； - ReadOnly：只读权限，包括SELECT - DDL: DDL权限，包括CREATE,DROP,ALTER,SHOW VIEW,CREATE VIEW - DML: DML权限，包括SELECT,INSERT,UPDATE,DELETE,SHOW VIEW。
* 另外Oracle账户对自己的schema有默认的读写权限，这里不会列出。

UserStatus.title: 数据库账号的状态。 - Locked：锁定 - ONLINE：解锁 创建完的账户默认为ONLINE状态

500.errorMessage: The request processing has failed due to some unknown error.

Role.title:
对于 Oracle 模式，角色为 schema 级别，其可分为
● ReadWrite：读写权限，包括 CREATE TABLE CREATE VIEW CREATE PROCEDURE CREATE SYNONYM CREATE SEQUENCE CREATE TRIGGER CREATE TYPE CREATE SESSION EXECUTE ANY PROCEDURE CREATE ANY OUTLINE ALTER ANY OUTLINE DROP ANY OUTLINE CREATE ANY PROCEDURE ALTER ANY PROCEDURE DROP ANY PROCEDURE CREATE ANY SEQUENCE ALTER ANY SEQUENCE DROP ANY SEQUENCE CREATE ANY TYPE ALTER ANY TYPE DROP ANY TYPE SYSKM CREATE ANY TRIGGER ALTER ANY TRIGGER DROP ANY TRIGGER CREATE PROFILE ALTER PROFILE DROP PROFILE；
● ReadOnly：只读权限，SELECT
对于MySQL模式，角色为数据库（Database）级别，其有以下几类：
● ReadWrite：读写权限，包括 ALL PRIVILEGES；
● ReadOnly：只读权限，包括 SELECT；
● DDL: DDL 权限，包括 CREATE,DROP,ALTER,SHOW VIEW,CREATE VIEW；
● DML: DML 权限，包括 SELECT,INSERT,UPDATE,DELETE,SHOW VIEW。

DML: a role that has DML privileges such as SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, and SHOW VIEW.

DescribeParameters.summary: You can call this operation to query the information of cluster or tenant parameters.

schema.title: 参数类型。 当前支持集群（CLUSTER)和租户（TENANT）
schema.description: It is an online CLI tool that allows you to quickly retrieve and debug APIs. It can dynamically generate executable SDK code samples.

schema.title: 参数类型的资源标识。 如果为集群参数可以不填，若为租户的参数，则传入租户的TenantId。
schema.description: Alibaba Cloud CLI

schema.title: 请求的返回结果。
schema.description: The default value of the parameter.

RequestId.title: 请求ID。
RequestId.description: The return result of the request.

Parameters.title: 参数列表信息
Parameters.description:
Indicates whether a restart is required for changes to the parameter to take effect. Valid values:   
- true: A restart is required.   
- false: A restart is not required.

items.description:
The resource ID of the parameter type.   
You can leave this parameter unspecified when you call this operation to query cluster parameters. In the case of tenant parameters, pass the tenant ID.

Description.title: 参数的描述信息。
Description.example:
The operation that you want to perform.   
Set the value to **DescribeParameters**.

ValueType.title: 参数取值的类型。 其支持： - ENUM: 数值枚举 - RANGE: 数值范围 - TIME: 时间 - CAPACITY：存储容量值（K，M，G）
ValueType.description:
The invalid value range of the parameter.    
It is an array with two string elements, which represents a range. The first element represents the minimum value and the second element represents the maximum value.

CurrentValue.title: 参数的当前取值。
CurrentValue.description: The ID of the OceanBase cluster.

NeedReboot.title: 修改此参数是否需要重启 - true：需要重启 - false：不需要重启

RejectedValue.title: 参数的不允许取值范围。 其格式为具备两个字符串元素的数组类型，表示一个范围值，第一个元素为最小值，第二个元素为最大值。

items.description:
<DescribeParametersResponse>
    <RequestId>EE205C00-30E4-XXXX-XXXX-87E3A8A2AA0C</RequestId>
    <Parameters>
        <Description>The maximum delay allowed in weak-consistency reads.</Description>
        <ValueType>CAPACITY</ValueType>
        <CurrentValue>600</CurrentValue>
        <NeedReboot>false</NeedReboot>
        <Name>connect_timeout</Name>
        <DefaultValue>600s</DefaultValue>
        <RejectedValue>1s</RejectedValue>
        <AcceptableValue>1s</AcceptableValue>
    </Parameters>
</DescribeParametersResponse>

AcceptableValue.title: 参数的可接受取值范围。 其格式为具备两个字符串元素的数组类型，表示一个范围值，第一个元素为最小值，第二个元素为最大值。

items.title: ob317v4uif****
items.description: ob317v4uif****

DescribeOasTopSQLList.title: DescribeOasTopSQLList

DescribeOasSlowSQLList.summary: You can call this API to view a list of slow queries.

schema.description: The ID of the OceanBase cluster.
The ID of the tenant.

The start time of querying slow SQL historical parameters.   
The value must be UTC time in the format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.

The end time of querying slow SQL historical parameters.   
The value must be UTC time in the format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.
The name of the database.
The search keyword.
The search parameter.
The search rule.
The search value.
SQL ID, the unique identifier of the SQL.
The IP of the database node.

All parameters are referenced by the symbol @. For a list of available parameters, refer to the returned parameters in [Query performance indicators of an SQL statement](https://en.oceanbase.com/docs/community-ocp-en-10000000000840290).
The language of the response.
Max length of the returned SQL text.

DescribeOutlineBinding.summary: You can call this operation to query the outline binding information or throttling information of an SQL statement in the database based on an SQLID.

schema.title: 租户ID。
schema.description: The ID of the tenant.

schema.title: 表名称。
schema.description:
The name of the tenant.    
It must start with a letter or an underscore (_), and contain 2 to 20 characters, which can be uppercase letters, lowercase letters, digits, and underscores (_). It cannot be set to SYS.

schema.title: 数据库名称
schema.description: The name of the database.

schema.title: SQLID
schema.description: SQLID.

schema.title: 当值为True时，查询SQLID在数据库中的限流信息
schema.description:
- When the value is set to True, the throttling information in the database is queried based on the SQL ID.   
- When the value is set to False, the bound index or execution plan in the database is queried based on the SQL ID.

schema.title: Oceanbase集群ID。
schema.description: The ID of the OceanBase cluster.

schema.title: 请求的返回结果
schema.description: The return result of the request.

MaxConcurrent.title: 最大并发
MaxConcurrent.description: The maximum number of concurrent tasks.

TableName.title: 表名称
TableName.description: The name of the tenant. The tenant name must start with a letter or an underscore (_), and contain 2 to 20 characters, which can be uppercase letters, lowercase letters, digits, and underscores (_). It cannot be set to sys.

2014.errorMessage: The request processing has failed due to some unknown error.

DescribeRecommendIndex.summary: You can call this operation to query the index recommended by the diagnostic system based on an SQL ID.

schema.title: 租户ID
schema.description:
The index recommended for the SQL statement after calculation by the diagnostic system.   
- If the recommended index is the primary key, PRIMARY is returned.  
- If an index created by the user is recommended, the index name is returned.   
The system recommends only one index for an SQL statement. You can call the DescribeIndexes operation to view the indexes of a table.

schema.title: Oceanbase集群ID。
schema.description: The return result of the request.

schema.title: SQLID
schema.description: The ID of the OceanBase cluster.

schema.title: 请求的返回结果
schema.description: You can obtain the SQL ID from the return value of the DescribeSlowSQLList or DescribeTopSQLList operation.

The tenant mode.   Valid values:  
Oracle   
MySQL

RecommendIndex.title: 推荐索引信息
RecommendIndex.description: The information about the recommended index.

SuggestIndex.title: 建议索引，如果是主键，就是 PRIMARY，如果不是主键，以用户取名为准

RocketMqSendMsgTimeout.title: 设置消息投递超时时间(目标端为 ROCKETMQ 时生效)

SyncSchema.title: 是否同步源端数据所在的 schema 到目标端（预期目标端表上会创建一个附加字段，用来接收 schema 名称，该字段见 syncSchemaColumnName 参数）

SyncSchemaColumnName.title: 若开启同步 schema 到目标端的功能，可以指定同步到目标端的字段名

SinkStoreFormat.title: 若开启同步 schema 到目标端的功能，可以指定同步到目标端的字段名

SourceStoreFormat.title: 若开启同步 schema 到目标端的功能，可以指定同步到目标端的字段名

ByteCharConvertStrategy.title: byte/char 转换方案，默认 DO_NOTHING_IF_BYTE_USED

NonePkUkTruncateDstTable.title:
在处理源端无唯一索引表德的全量迁移时，是否 truncate 目标表（清空目标表数据）,组件层面默认为 true。
目前场景：PolarDB-X 1.0 多链路无主键表汇聚到同一目标端表，避免前若干条链路前有部分数据后，另一链路刚启动就清空了历史的迁移数据

AllowDestTableNotEmpty.title:
允许目标端表非空，在源端多个分表向目标端一张表聚合迁移时，需要打开。
注意：只有在没有选中"全量校验"的情况下，才允许打开此开关。

ReadWorkerNum.title: 读取并发数 null 未配置

EnableSequencingWithinTxn.title: 有增量同步阶段时，且增量日志拉取组件为 Store 时，是否开启事务内序号编排

StepInfo.title: 步骤详情,全量传输/增量传输/正向切换

RunningStep.title: 正在处于 running step (PRE_CHECK, TRANSFER_PRECHECK, PREPARE, STRUCT_TRANSFER, STRUCT_MIGRATION, INDEX_MIGRATION, INDEX_TRANSFER, STRUCT_SYNC, FULL_MIGRATION, FULL_TRANSFER, APP_SWITCH, TRANSFER_APP_SWITCH, REVERSE_INCR_SYNC, REVERSE_INCR_TRANSFER, FULL_VALIDATION, FULL_VERIFIER, INCR_LOG_PULL, TRANSFER_INCR_LOG_PULL, INCR_SYNC, INCR_TRANSFER, INCR_VERIFIER, SYNC_PREPARE, TRANSFER_PREPARE, SYNC_INCR_LOG_PULL, CONNECTOR_FULL_SYNC, CONNECTOR_INCR_SYNC)

Subtopics.title: 任务关联 store 的 subtopics

ReverseSubtopics.title: 任务关联反向 store 的 subtopics

SyncDelaySampleTimestamp.title: 同步延迟的采集时间戳，秒级别

AccessObSource.title: 是否能够直连OB源端，不能的话Store Source会变为LogProxy Source

OverwriteConfig.title: 是否允许完全覆盖更新配置

IgnoreUnsupportDdl.title: 对于connector，是否忽略不支持的ddl

SubDbs.title: 记录不同下游消费方的表配置，用于同步任务复用时的配置合并

DatabaseId.title: 目前只有逻辑库才会具有 id，可能存在在一个 Endpoint 中库名相同，但是 id 不同，表示的是不同的 id 情况

SourceClientId.title: 用于标识是哪个 source client 来处理该 databaseName

TableId.title: 目前只有逻辑表才会存在 tableId，在逻辑表中可能存库表名完全相同，但是只能根据 id 才能区分的场景

Instance.title: 逻辑表返回的 instance，只有逻辑表会存在, @link PhysicalTableDTO#url

Columns.title: 表列信息，如果是逻辑表可能放在外层

RecordFieldType.title: 列类型引申 (INT8, INT16, INT24, INT32, INT64, BIGINT, BOOLEAN, FLOAT, DOUBLE, DECIMAL, NUMBER, MONEY, DEC_FLOAT, REAL, UCHAR_STRING, GRAPHIC_STRING, CHAR_STRING, NCHAR_STRING, VAR_GRAPHIC_STRING, VAR_UCHAR_STRING, VAR_STRING, VAR_CHAR_STRING, VAR_NCHAR_STRING, ROW_ID, UROWID, TEXT, UTEXT, TINY_TEXT, MEDIUM_TEXT, LONG_TEXT, BINARY_BYTES, VAR_BINARY_BYTES, RAW, LONG_RAW, BIT, VAR_BIT, BLOB, TINY_BLOB, MEDIUM_BLOB, LONG_BLOB, BFILE, IMAGE, JSONB, UUID, ENUM, SET, INTERVAL_DAY_TO_SECOND, INTERVAL_YEAR_TO_MONTH, INTERVAL_DATE_TIME, CLOB, NCLOB, XML, JSON, LONG_VAR_CHAR, LONG_VAR_GRAPHIC, GEOGRAPHY, GEOMETRY, POINT, LSEG, BOX, PATH, CIRCLE, LINESTRING, POLYGON, MULTIPOINT, MULTILINESTRING, MULTIPOLYGON, GEOMETRYCOLLECTION, CIDR, INET, MACADDR, MACADDR8, TSVERCTOR, TSQUERY, YEAR, DATE, MYSQL_NEW_DATE, TIME, TIME_WITH_NANOS, TIME_WITH_TIMEZONE, DATETIME, DATETIME_WITH_NONAS, TIMESTAMP_IN_LONG, TIMESTAMP_IN_LONG_WITH_NANOS, TIMESTAMP, TIMESTAMP_WITH_NANOS, TIMESTAMP_WITH_TIMEZONE, TIMESTAMP_WITH_LOCAL_TIMEZONE, ZONED_DATETIME, OID, REGCLASS, REGCOLLATION, REGCONFIG, REGDICTIONARY, REGNAMESPACE, REGOPER, REGOPERATOR, REGROLE, REGTYPE, INT4RANGE, INT8RANGE, NUMRANGE, TSRANGE, TSTZRANGE, DATERANGE, STRUCT, LIST, NULL, CUSTOM_TYPE, UNSUPPORTED_TYPE)

RawColumnType.title: 数据库记录的列类型原始字符串

FilterColumns.title: 过滤列，如果该集合空表示都需要，如果该集合有值表示保留值

LogicTableId.title: 针对逻辑表下，逻辑表 tableId

SourceEndpointId.title: 针对物理表下传递 endpointId

MaxConnectorCount.title: connector 最大数量，-1 表示不限制

IncrSyncTimestamp.title: 增量当前位点 秒级时间戳

RuleToRecentlyTriggerCount.title: 分规则最近告警消息数

OpenMonitor.title: 公有云下，是否开启监控告警开关

Type.title: 类型 (MIGRATION: 数据迁移任务, SYNC: 数据同步任务)

Importance.title: 项目告警等级 (HIGH: 高保护状态, MEDIUM: 中保护状态, LOW: 低保护状态, IGNORE: 无保护状态)

Status.title: 项目状态 (INIT: 未启动, RUNNING: 运行中, SUSPEND: 暂停中, FAILED: 已失败, FINISHED: 已完成, RELEASING: 释放中, RELEASED: 已释放, DELETED: 已删除, RUNNING_MODIFYING: 修改中, RUNNING_MERGING: 合并中)

GmtCreate.title: 项目创建时间 UTC时间

GmtModified.title: 项目更新时间 UTC时间

SourceEndpointType.title: 源端数据源类型 (MYSQL, MARIADB, OB_MYSQL, OB_MYSQL_CE, OB_ORACLE, ORACLE, DB2_LUW, KAFKA, ROCKETMQ, DATAHUB, SYBASE, LOGPROXY, ADB, DBP_OP_ROUTE, DMS, IDB, TIDB, POSTGRESQL, POLARDB_X_1)

SinkEndpointType.title: 目的端数据源 id (MYSQL, MARIADB, OB_MYSQL, OB_MYSQL_CE, OB_ORACLE, ORACLE, DB2_LUW, KAFKA, ROCKETMQ, DATAHUB, SYBASE, LOGPROXY, ADB, DBP_OP_ROUTE, DMS, IDB, TIDB, POSTGRESQL, POLARDB_X_1)

Mode.title: 传输对象映射模式 (SPECIFIC, WILDCARD)

CommonTransferConfig.title: 公共传输配置（所有步骤）

MqSerializerType.title: 投递到消息队列时，数据 json 序列化类型

MqPartitionMode.title: 投递到消息队列时，分区路由方式

MqPartition.title: 当 partitionMode 为 ONE 时，此参数表示投递分区的在当前 topic 下的位置

DatahubTopicType.title: 投递到消息队列时，指定 topic 的类型

RocketMqProducerGroup.title: 指定生产组名(目标端为 ROCKETMQ 时生效),默认 OMS

RocketMqMsgTags.title: 设置消息 tag(目标端为 ROCKETMQ 时生效)，默认 default -> default_tag

RocketMqEnableMsgTrace.title: 是否开启消息追踪(目标端为 ROCKETMQ 时生效)

RocketMqSendMsgTimeout.title: 设置消息投递超时时间(目标端为 ROCKETMQ 时生效)

DeferIndexCreation.title: 是否允许索引后置（默认不允许）

NonePkUkTruncateDstTable.title: 在处理源端无唯一索引表德的全量迁移时，是否 truncate 目标表（清空目标表数据）,组件层面默认为 true

AllowDestTableNotEmpty.title: 允许目标端表非空，在源端多个分表向目标端一张表聚合迁移时，需要打开

FullTransferSpeedMode.title: 全量迁移  配置(STEADY：平稳，NORMAL：正常，FAST：快速)。

FullVerifySpeedMode.title: 全量校验  配置(STEADY：平稳，NORMAL：正常，FAST：快速)。

EnableReverseIncrTransfer.title: 是否启用反向增量传输

StartTimestamp.title: 勾选了增量且没勾选全量时，允许设置增量起始位点，秒级时间戳

RecordTypeWhiteList.title: 有增量同步阶段时，同步的增量数据类型

StoreLogKeptHour.title: 有增量同步阶段，且增量日志拉取组件为 Store 时，日志保存时间, 单位小时，默认7天，最长365天

EnableSequencingWithinTxn.title: 有增量同步阶段时，且增量日志拉取组件为 Store 时，是否开启事务内序号编排

EnableIncrSyncStatistics.title: 是否开启增量记录(dml\ddl)统计

StartTimestamp.title: 勾选了增量且没勾选全量时，允许设置增量起始位点，秒级时间戳

RecordTypeWhiteList.title: 有增量同步阶段时，同步的增量数据类型

StoreLogKeptHour.title: 有增量同步阶段，且增量日志拉取组件为 Store 时，日志保存时间, 单位小时，默认7天，最长365天

EnableSequencingWithinTxn.title: 有增量同步阶段时，且增量日志拉取组件为 Store 时，是否开启事务内序号编排

EnableIncrSyncStatistics.title: 是否开启增量记录(dml\ddl)统计

EndpointSide.title: 终端节点类型（source 源端，dest 目的端） （后续set进去，库中不存储） (SOURCE, DEST)

CreateOmsMysqlDataSource.summary: You can call this operation to create a MySQL data source.

schema.title: 数据源名称。长度为2~128个英文或中文字符。可以包含数字、下划线（_）、半角句号（.）或者短划线（-）。不能包含“/”等非法字符
schema.description:
The name of the data source. It must be 2 to 128 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, underscores (_), periods (.), and hyphens (-). >
Invalid characters, such as slashes (/), are not allowed.

schema.title:
所有 mysql 的类型 枚举：
INTERNET、VPC、RDS、POLARDB、DG
schema.description:
The type of the MySQL data source.   
Valid values: INTERNET, VPC, RDS, PolarDB, and DG.

schema.title: 数据源所属VPC ID。若Type为VPC则该字段必填。
schema.description:
The ID of the VPC to which the data source belongs. >
If Type is set to VPC, this parameter is required.

schema.title: 数据源云实例ID。若Type为RDS、POLARDB、DG该字段必填。
schema.description:
The ID of the ECS instance of the data source. >
If Type is set to RDS, PolarDB, or DG, this parameter is required.

schema.title: database gateway，数据库网关实例 id。若Type为 DG，该字段必填。
schema.description:
The ID of the database gateway instance. >
If Type is set to DG, this parameter is required.

schema.title: 数据源 ip 地址。若Type为INTERNET、VPC该字段必填。
schema.description:
The IP address of the data source. >
If Type is set to INTERNET or VPC, this parameter is required.

schema.title: 数据源端口。若Type为INTERNET、VPC该字段必填。
schema.description:
The port number of the data source. >
If Type is set to INTERNET or VPC, this parameter is required.

schema.title: 数据库名。若填写，后续迁移或者同步操作，只会针对该数据库操作；
schema.description:
The name of the database. >
If you specify this parameter, subsequent migration or synchronization operations will take effect on this database only.

schema.title: 数据库连接用户名。
schema.description: The username that is used to access the database.

schema.title: 数据库连接密码，待加密明文（必须经过Base64编码）。
schema.description:
The password of the username that is used to access the database. It must be Base64 encoded.   
For example, for the password abcd123@!, the Base64-encoded value is YWJjZDEyM0Ah.

schema.title: 数据源的描述。长度为2~256个英文或中文字符。默认值为空。
schema.description:
The description of the data source.   

It must be 2 to 256 characters in length. The default value is null.
schema.example: MySQL data source for OMS testing

schema.title: 请求的返回结果
schema.description: The return result of the request.

Data.description: The return result of the request.

EndpointId.description: The ID of the data source record.

CreateOmsMysqlDataSource.description: To call this operation, you must add the IP address of the OceanBase Migration Service (OMS) server to the whitelist of the Alibaba Cloud database instance, the security rules of the ECS instance, or the security settings of your self-managed database (usually the firewall of your self-managed database) to ensure that OMS can successfully access your database instance. To obtain the IP address of the OMS server, go to the OMS data source management page in the OMS console.

DescribeRestorableTenants.summary: Queries information about restorable OceanBase Database tenants.

schema.title: Oceanbase集群ID。
schema.description: The ID of the OceanBase cluster.

schema.title: 为兼容老版本，可以为空
schema.description: This parameter is provided for compatibility with earlier versions and can be left empty.

schema.title: 备份集ID
schema.description: The ID of the backup set.

schema.title: 恢复方式
schema.description: The restore method. This parameter is required when `IsRemote` is set to `true`, and is optional otherwise.

schema.title: 备份类型
schema.description: The backup method.

schema.title: 目标解析集群是否在线。为兼容旧版本可以不填，不填时值为对isRemote取反

schema.title: 恢复对象类型
schema.description: The type of the restore object.

schema.title: 请求的返回结果
schema.description: The return result of the request.

items.description: The list of tenant information.

items.description: Information about the restorable periods.

StartTime.description: The start time of the restorable period.

EndTime.description: The end time of the restorable period.

FromArchive.description: Indicates whether the restore is based on archiving.

StorageType.description: The storage type of backup data.

ObRpmVersion.description: The version of the OceanBase Database RPM package.

ObVersion.description: The major version of OceanBase Database.

MemoryNum.title: 租户memory规格

items.description: The information about the backupsets.

Checkpoint.description: The checkpoint of the backup set.

SetId.title: 备份集ID
SetId.description: The ID of the backup set.

UsedDisk.title: 租户磁盘大小

UnitNum.title: 租户节点数

DescribeAnomalySQLList.summary: You can call this operation to obtain the list of SQL statements that may have performance problems according to the diagnostic system.

schema.title: 租户ID
schema.description: The ID of the tenant.

schema.title: 起始时间
schema.description:
The start time of the time range for querying suspicious SQL statements.   
The value must be UTC time in the format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.

schema.title: 结束时间
schema.description:
The end time of the time range for querying suspicious SQL statements.   
The value must be UTC time in the format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.

schema.title: 数据库名称
schema.description: The name of the database.

schema.title: 关键字查询
schema.description: The search keyword.

schema.title: 参数查询
schema.description: The search parameter.

schema.title: 查询规则
schema.description:
The search rule.   
Valid values: "=", ">", ">=", "<", and "<="

schema.title: 查询值
schema.description: The search value.

schema.title: SQLID
schema.description: SQLID.

schema.title: 节点ip
schema.description: The IP address of the node.

schema.title: 分页查询时设置的每页行数。 最大值：100 默认值：10
schema.description:
The number of rows to return on each page.    
- Maximum value: 100   
- Default value: 10

schema.title: 分页查询的页码。 起始值：1 默认值：1
schema.description:
The number of the page to return.    
- Start value: 1   
- Default value: 1

schema.title: 过滤条件
schema.description:
The filter condition. >
- All fields in OceanBase Database support filtering.
- You can write the key-value pair of a parameter in a JSON string in the JSON format to filter the parameter.

schema.title: 排序列
schema.description: The sorted column.

schema.title: 排序规则
schema.description: The sorting rule.

The language of the returned data.   
Default value: CN for a China site and EN for an International site.

schema.title: 请求的返回结果
schema.description: The return result of the request.

AnomalySQLList.title: 可疑SQL列表
AnomalySQLList.description: The list of suspicious SQL statements.

Key.title: 返回数据序号
Key.description: The sequence number of the returned SQL statement.

SQLText.title: sql文本
SQLText.example: SELECT  ****   FROM ****   WHERE **** = ? AND **** = ?   ORDER BY **** ASC

Suggestion.title: 建议
Suggestion.example: Check your business scenarios, data distribution changes, request surges, and execution plan changes.

CpuTime.title: 平均CPU时间（ms）
CpuTime.description: The average CPU time, in ms.

Diagnosis.title: 诊断信息
Diagnosis.example: Total number of executions = 80199, Average CPU time = 6.8 ms, Overall CPU utilization = 87%

2014.errorMessage: The request processing has failed due to some unknown error.

DescribeTopSQLList.summary: You can call this operation to query SQL execution performance data collected by the diagnostic system.

schema.title: 租户ID
schema.description: The average CPU time, in ms.

schema.title: 起始时间。
schema.description: The maximum response time, in ms.

schema.title: 结束时间。
schema.description: The SQL type.

schema.description: The number of block index cache hits.

schema.description: The number of retries.

schema.description: The number of Bloom filter cache hits.

schema.title: SQLID

schema.title: 节点ip
schema.description: The number of failures.

schema.title: 分页查询的页码。 起始值：1 默认值：1
schema.description: The queuing time, in ms.

schema.title: 分页查询时设置的每页行数。 最大值：100 默认值：10
schema.description: The number of row cache hits.

schema.title: 过滤条件
schema.description:
The average number of logical reads of the SQL statement during the specified period of time. The value covers the numbers of reads of different caches and the number of disk I/Os. It is an important metric for measuring the SQL filtering performance. >
A higher ratio of the number of logical reads to the number of returned rows indicates poorer filtering performance. General causes include non-standard content written by SQL statements, non-standard table indexes created, and non-standard SQL execution plans.

schema.title: 排序列
schema.description: The number of rows read from the disk.

schema.title: 排序规则
schema.description: The list of top SQL statements.

schema.title: 请求的返回结果
schema.description: You can call this operation to query SQL execution performance data collected by the diagnostic system.

TotalCount.title: 总数量
TotalCount.description: It is an online CLI tool that allows you to quickly retrieve and debug APIs. It can dynamically generate executable SDK code samples.
